mapper.select: SELECT pl_id as 'parkingLotID', rl_id as 'parkingLotNm' FROM tbl_parkingLot WHERE pl_id = #{parkingAreaID}

SELECT lane_code as 'laneCode', parkinglot_no as 'parkingLotNo', parking_level_code as 'parkingLevelCode', parking_zone_code as 'parkingZoneCode', lane_seq_num as 'laneSeqNum', lane_name as 'laneName', lane_type as 'laneType', manage_type as 'manageType', lane_status as 'laneStatus' FROM tbl_parkingLotUseInfo WHERE parkinglot_no = #{parkingAreaId}
